original_text: For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evils. It is through this craving that some have wandered away from the faith and pierced themselves with many pangs.
korean_text: 돈을 사랑함이 일만 악의 뿌리가 되나니 이것을 탐내는 자들은 미혹을 받아 믿음에서 떠나 많은 근심으로써 자기를 찔렀도다

sentences.original_text: For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evils.
sentences.korean_translation: 돈 사랑은 모든 종류의 악의 뿌리가 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: It is through this craving that some have wandered away from the faith
sentences.korean_translation: 이 욕심으로 말미암아 어떤 이들은 믿음에서 떠나갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: and pierced themselves with many pangs.
